summary: ESP TEA & COFFEE - We are a vibrant cafe located in Old Town Alexandria serving artisanal espresso, premium tea, & Pie Shop Pie! with a chill vibe, smiles, and music. All Art on the Wall is for Sale! We have an Art Gallery down the street at 1303 King Street called Galactic Panther full of visionary art and a healthy calendar of events. Three outdoor seating areas. Large parking lot behind (access on Patrick Street or Henry Street). OPENING HOURS: Monday - Thursday: 7:30am - 7:00 pm, Friday - Sunday: 7:30am - 8:00pm.
